title: Sanam
occurrences: My dear Sanam, you are most welcome here.
Don't skip work again. I didn't tell Sanam the first time.
- Sanam, that's enough! - I'm going to kill him! Let go of me!
- You skip work? I'll kill you. - Sanam!
- You should believe in that. - I cannot say anything to Sanam.
Sanam is a young woman. I can't tell her whether to remarry.
- You can take care of them, there's no doubt. - Sanam,
Sanam, how long do you want to wait? You are very young and my son is still young.
Sanam, his life is in order.
- Excuse me, Sanam. Sanam! - Go and find the kid and bring him back.
- Sanam, I'm really sorry. - You have to answer to me.
- I'm sorry, Sanam. - You were supposed to take care of him!
